title: Manado Indonesia Golf Resort Escape with Outdoor Pool & International Restaurant
description:
Nestled on the outskirts of Manado, this hotel invites you to experience tropical sophistication at its finest. With an 18-hole golf course, the resort has endless leisure and recreation opportunities. Refresh in the shimmering outdoor pool, rejuvenate with a pampering spa treatment, or savour mouthwatering international cuisine at The Square restaurant.

Positioned between verdant hills and the sparkling Celebes Sea, you're well placed to discover the best of North Sulawesi. Venture to Bunaken National Marine Park for world-renowned diving and snorkelling, hike the trails of the mighty Klabat Volcano, or immerse yourself in the lively culture of Manado's traditional markets.
location_description: Novotel Manado Golf Resort & Convention Center
offer_address: A.A. Maramis, Kayuwatu, Kairagi II, North Sulawesi, Manado 95254, Indonesia
